com.mercadopago.resources

Class AdvancedPayment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mercadopago.core.MPBase
      • com.mercadopago.resources.AdvancedPayment

  • public class AdvancedPayment
extends MPBase
    Provides a solution for Marketplace payments where the business model requires splitting money between multiple sellers

    • Field Summary
